title: Berserker's Glove
summaries: The Berserker's Glove is a Hardmode accessory crafted from the Power Glove and Flesh Knuckles, granting the abilities of both. It grants the following:

• +8 defense
  • +12% increased melee speed
  • +100% increased melee knockback
  • +10% increased melee weapon size
  • +400 aggro
  • Autoswing for melee weapons and whips
